9314.title: The terms for this service are translated into different languages

tosdr.case: The terms for this service are translated into different languages
tosdr.tldr: Both the Terms of Service and the Privacy Policy are available in multiple languages.

9315.quoteText: Our Services are for your individual, non-commercial, entertainment purposes only.
9315.title: This service is only available for use individually and non-commercially.

tosdr.case: This service is only available for use individually and non-commercially.

9316.quoteText:
You must be at least 13 years of age (or such other minimum age as is applicable in your country of residence) to create an Account.
If You are between 13 and 18 (or the age of majority where You live), You and your parent or guardian must review this Agreement together.
 Parents and guardians are responsible for the acts of children under 18 years of age when using our Services.
9316.title: This service is only available to users of a certain age

tosdr.case: This service is only available to users over a certain age

9317.quoteText: You acknowledge that You may not create multiple Accounts.
9317.title: Service does not allow alternative accounts

tosdr.case: Service does not allow alternative accounts

9318.quoteText: We collect Data such as your age and gender, the advertisement and the number of times it was watched, its location in the game and the identifier of your device.
9318.title: The service collects many different types of personal data

tosdr.case: The service collects many different types of personal data

9319.quoteText: You may terminate your Account at any time, automatically and without any judicial formality on the Ubisoft Account management page https://account.ubisoft.com/
9319.title: You can request access and deletion of personal data

tosdr.case: You can request access and deletion of personal data

9320.quoteText: We reserve the right to modify these Terms and other notices contained on the UBISOFT Services, at any time, temporarily or permanently and entirely at our own discretion.
9320.title: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to the user

tosdr.case: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to the user

9321.quoteText: We have incurred, in addition and without prejudice to the right to terminate your Account in accordance with these Terms.
9321.title: The service can suspend your account for several reasons

tosdr.case: The service can suspend your account for several reasons

9322.quoteText:
We allow some of our partners to set and access their Cookies on your device.
These partners’ use of Cookies is subject to their own privacy policies and not this Privacy Policy.
9322.title: The service refers users to external documents for more information

tosdr.case: The service refers users to external documents for more information

9323.quoteText:
You make a purchase in our games and in our online services.

We collect the Data needed to process your purchase, such as your last name, first name, mailing and email addresses, country, bank details and purchase history. This Data is sent to our partner service providers that are in charge of the payment and the delivery of your purchase
9323.title: Your personal data is given to third parties

tosdr.case: Your personal data is given to third parties

9324.quoteText:
Certain Services may require the creation of a "Username" or an "avatar".
You agree that your Username and/or avatar are linked to your Account and will be publicly displayed.&nbsp.
We therefore advise You not to include your last name in your Username.
9324.title: The service allows you to use pseudonyms

tosdr.case: The service allows you to use pseudonyms

9325.quoteText:
We also collect information about your actions in relation to the advertisement, such as the sites visited as well as the dates and times of the visits.

We can combine the Data collected with our partners when you use our Services. We also combine this Data with demographic, advertising and market studies or with other analytic surveys.

We may also use all of your Data collected to offer you personalised advertisements, products, services or content (hereinafter referred to as “Personalised Content”) via our Services or those of our partners.
9325.title: The service uses your personal data for advertising

tosdr.case: The service uses your personal data for advertising

9326.quoteText: You are also solely responsible for maintaining the confidentiality and security of your Account and any User identification, passwords, authentication codes or other security devices or procedures (collectively "Password").
9326.title: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and for the activities on your account

tosdr.case: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and for the activities on your account

9335.quoteText:
We will keep your Data for the time needed to apply these sanctions.
This Data may include for example your Account identifier, your game data, your IP address, the identifier of your device and your chat history.
9335.title: This service keeps user logs for an undefined period of time

tosdr.case: This service keeps user logs for an undefined period of time

9336.quoteText: This includes, but is not limited to, comments, private messages or UGC containing or relating to inappropriate behavior, including physical abuse, sexual abuse, and/or pornography
9336.title: Prohibits the posting of pornographic content

tosdr.case: Prohibits the posting of pornographic content

9337.title: There is a date of the last update of the terms

tosdr.case: There is a date of the last update of the terms

11359.quoteText:
We also collect information about your actions in relation to the advertisement, such as the sites visited as well as the dates and times of the visits.

We can combine the Data collected with our partners when you use our Services. We also combine this Data with demographic, advertising and market studies or with other analytic surveys.

We may also use all of your Data collected to offer you personalised advertisements, products, services or content (hereinafter referred to as “Personalised Content”) via our Services or those of our partners
11359.title: This service may use your personal information for marketing purposes

tosdr.case: This service may use your personal information for marketing purposes

11360.quoteText: In the preceding 12 months, we have disclosed the following categories of your Data for business or commercial purposes: identifiers, personal information categories listed in the California Customer Records statute, commercial information, internet or other similar network activity, and geolocation data.
11360.title: This service may collect, use, and share location data

tosdr.case: This service may collect, use, and share location data

11361.quoteText:
we have “sold” the following categories of your Data, depending on how the CCPA is interpreted: identifiers, personal information categories listed in the California Customer Records statute, commercial information, internet or other similar network activity, and geolocation data.

Minors: We may share or “sell” your personal information as described in Minors of our Privacy Policy.

Your Rights and Choices : You have the right to (1) request more information about the categories and specific pieces of Data we have collected, sold and disclosed for a business purpose in the last 12 months, (2) deletion of your Data, and (3) opt out of the sale of your Data, if applicable,
11361.title: The service may sell your data unless you opt out

tosdr.case: The service may sell your data unless you opt out
